articles.author: Audrey Kurth Cronin
articles.title: We are living in an age of lethal empowerment - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: The trifecta of open tech, expanded communication and a global spread of political violence has created real peril around the digital revolution
articles.content: Audrey Kurth Cronin is professor of international security at American University and director of the Center for Security, Innovation, and New Technology. Her book, Power to the People: How Open Technological Innovation is Arming Tomorrows Terrorists, is a fi… [+14343 chars]
